domain_knowledge.first action: accept cookies pop-up if present, to avoid blocking further actions.
domain_knowledge.second action: if a login/ sign in prompt appears, log in/sign in using stored credentials before proceeding., prefer sign in over sign up/ create account
domain_knowledge.page analysis: analyse complete page at one go and try to fill everything and click next for the first iteration itself
domain_knowledge.skill_selectors: For searchable skill dropdowns: type ONE skill, wait 1 sec, click suggestion. Repeat for each skill.
domain_knowledge.file_uploads: ALWAYS verify file upload: after send_keys(), check if value attribute is set. Print confirmation.
domain_knowledge.multi_select: Add items one by one: type, wait, select, repeat. Never paste comma-separated list.
domain_knowledge.button_clicks: If normal click fails with 'element click intercepted', use JavaScript click: driver.execute_script('arguments[0].click();', element)
domain_knowledge.sign in button: Use data-automation-id='signInSubmitButton' or class containing 'css-1ru62dj' for Workday sign in
domain_knowledge.modal dialogs: Always check for modal dialogs after page loads or actions. If present, handle them before proceeding.
